prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with a large, flowing mane and a mischievous smile.
I want a dark-type Pokemon that combines elegance with an intimidating presence.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that uses its deceptive appearance to confuse opponents.
Make a whimsical creature that blends both softness and sharpness in its design.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that embodies the themes of illusion and charm.
Design a Pokemon that has a striking contrast between its colors and features.
Give me a character that looks cute but has a hidden fierce side.

distinctive_features: Large black hair resembling a jaw
